revision.text:
{{#invoke:Charactercodes| doInfobox | AR }} {{Side|Human Arden|2|c|O}} {{ma|Unnamed Humans (23rd century)}} ==Skills Tables/Updates == {{#invoke:CharacterLists|main| skills | AR }} ==Section heading== Here is all the info i currently have stored in his data-file... {{#invoke:Charactercodes | expand | AR}}
== Trivia == Arden is one of the antagonists in the Event called [[Isolated Station]]. Inside the storyline, he is referred to as ''Antonio'' which might be a minor mistake. Presumably Antonio is the first-name of the actor who sat for the costume-headshot. [[Category:Tier 2]] [[Category:TOS Crew]] [[Category:Blue]] [[Category:Orange]] [[Category:White]] [[Category:Federation]]

revision.comment: My own observation while fighting against, or using, Lt. Worf.
